DOCNAME: CASE OF YERANOSYAN AND OTHERS v. ARMENIA
JUDGES: Alvina Gyulumyan;Elisabet Fura;Ineta Ziemele;Josep Casadevall;Luis López Guerra
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicants were born in DATE , DATE , DATE , DATE , DATE , DATE , DATE and DATE respectively and live in GPE .

CARDINAL . According to the applicants , they enjoyed a right of use of accommodation in respect of a house which measured QUANTITY . m and was situated at CARDINAL FAC , GPE . The house was owned by their family member , GPE The Government contested this allegation and claimed that only the applicants PERSON , PERSON , GPE GPE and ORG enjoyed such a right , while the remaining applicants , who were minors , were only entitled to live in the house in question .

CARDINAL . On DATE the Government adopted Decree no . PERSON , approving the expropriation zones of the immovable property ( plots of land , buildings and constructions ) situated within the administrative boundaries of LOC of GPE to be taken for the needs of the State for the purpose of carrying out construction projects , covering a total area of QUANTITY m. FAC was listed as one of the streets falling within such expropriation zones .
CARDINAL . On DATE the Government decided to contract out the construction of CARDINAL of the sections of FAC DATE which was to be renamed FAC – to a private company , ORG

CARDINAL . On DATE PERSON and ORG signed an agreement which , inter alia , authorised the former to negotiate directly with the owners of the property subject to expropriation and , should such negotiations fail , to institute court proceedings on behalf of the ORG , seeking forced expropriation of such property .

CARDINAL . It appears that by a letter of DATE PERSON informed the applicants that the house in question was situated within the expropriation zone of the FAC area and was to be taken for ORG needs . It further appears that each applicant was offered CARDINAL as compensation .
CARDINAL . It appears that the applicants did not accept this offer .
CARDINAL . On an unspecified date ORG instituted proceedings against the applicants on behalf of the ORG , seeking to terminate their right of use of accommodation and to have them evicted .

CARDINAL . On DATE the GPE and ORG of GPE ( Երևան քաղաքի Կենտրոն և Նորք-Մարաշ համայնքների աոաջին ատյանի դատարան ) granted the claim of ORG , terminating the applicants ' right of use and awarding each of them the NORP dram equivalent of CARDINAL in compensation . In doing so , the court referred to LAW .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicants lodged an appeal .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG ( ՀՀ քաղաքացիական գործերով վերաքննիչ դատարան ) granted the claim of ORG on the same grounds as FAC .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicants lodged an appeal on points of law which they supplemented on DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG ( ՀՀ վճռաբեկ դատարան ) dismissed the applicants ' appeal .
CARDINAL . For a summary of the relevant domestic provisions related to the right of use of accommodation see the judgment in the case of PERSON and PERSON v. GPE ( no . GPE , § § DATE , DATE ) .

CARDINAL . Article CARDINAL § CARDINAL of LAW , as in force at the material time , provided that a plot of land might be taken from the owner for the needs of the ORG or the community by compensating its value . Depending on for whose needs a plot of land was to be taken , its value was to be compensated by either the ORG or the community .
